body.name: Ross-Simons Jade Good Fortune Bracelet in 18kt Gold Over Sterling
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 17 hrs 56 mins.
features: 18kt yellow gold over sterling silver, green jade bracelet for women. 3/8" wide. 7.5" long. Box clasp provides security that blends seamlessly into the design. Includes jewelry presentation box.

GREEN JADE BRACELET FOR WOMEN: This elegant green jade bracelet for women is a gorgeous addition to any woman's jewelry box. Lovely worn alone or paired with complementary bangles or chain bracelets, this is a truly versatile bracelet.

ROSS-SIMONS QUALITY: Treat yourself to the luxury & beauty of Ross-Simons fine jewelry. Whether in 14kt gold, 18kt gold, or gorgeous sterling silver, our finely crafted jewelry is an unforgettable, unique gift for women.

ROSS-SIMONS IS a trusted name in fine jewelry for 65 years & counting. From elegant 14kt gold bangles to tennis bracelets & byzantine necklaces to classic gold hoop earrings & diamond stud earrings, we offer fine jewelry for women for every occasion.

GIVE THE GIFT OF JEWELRY: A timeless & traditional holiday or anniversary gift for a woman or girl of any age, Ross-Simons jewelry in luminous 14kt gold, 18kt gold, or 925 sterling silver, is the perfect gift to let her know just how much you care. Due to the naturally occurring characteristics of gemstones, each is unique and may exhibit imperfections such as inclusions , blemishes and cloudiness, as well as color variations.
body.description: Ross-Simons is the authority on fashionable must-haves. This bracelet style is a favorite among jade lovers, showing off the opaque green gemstone in sleek bars. Box clasp, 18kt yellow gold over sterling silver bracelet. Stone InformationGem Type 1: JadeStone Cut 1: CabochonStone Color 1: GreenStone Clarity 1: GreenStone Shape 1: Rectangular-ShapeStone Creation Method 1: NaturalStone Treatment Method 1: Dyed, ImpregnatedStone Weight 1: 0 CaratsNumber Of Stones 1: 10

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ross-Simons Jewelry As a premier retail fine jeweler, we have consistently delivered exceptional quality, value and service for over 70 years. Our long-standing mission remains unchanged: to make elegant and beautiful jewelry affordable for you.

Ross-Simons: Our Brands We truly have something for everyone. Explore our family of brands and find the perfect jewelry to suit your style and budget. Ross-Simons: Your Story Every piece of jewelry tells a story. With so many fabulous styles at amazing prices, we’re excited to help you tell yours. Ross-Simons Jewelry Styling Tips Jewelry is about having fun! Create your look with classic pieces, on-trend styles, best-selling basics, traditional favorites, handmade exclusives and more. Ross-Simons: Our History For over 70 years, we’ve proudly sourced beautiful fine jewelry from around the globe and delivered it direct to your door.

Previous page Ross-Simons Jewelry From classic looks to the latest trends, we offer a vast selection of high-quality jewelry styles Bracelets Best-selling links, perfect-fit bolos, stack-ready bangles, gorgeous gemstone and diamond bracelets Earrings Explore our earring collection for hoops, drops, studs, chandeliers, climbers, threaders and more. Necklaces Pretty pendants, classic chains, slinky links, layerable styles. Rings Cocktail rings, fashion rings, eternity bands, stackable bands and more. Next page 1 Ross-Simons Jewelry 2 Bracelets 3 Earrings 4 Necklaces 5 Rings

Previous page Lab Grown Diamonds Our lab-grown diamonds have the same brilliance, hardness and durability as mined diamonds. Diamonds Our quality diamonds are expertly sourced to meet our exceptional standards. Gold We use only high-quality, real gold for our rich 14kt and 18kt gold fine jewelry designs. Gemstones Our gemstones are ethically mined and carefully selected for rarity, quality and natural beauty. Next page 1 Lab Grown Diamonds 2 Diamonds 3 Gold 4 Gemstones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely gorgeous. Looked fabulous on. Good quality, made well. Priced right. Shipped fast. Good company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As advertised. Nice bracelet. Very good vendor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The wife loves it.
reviews.reviewText: The wife loves this and it was affordable. Seems well made and I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad piece
reviews.reviewText: The clasps/lock on bracelet is weak, the two hooks on each side don’t fit snuggly to the sides and so it keeps coming undone. I’m afraid to wear it as it may fall off and I wouldn’t even be aware of it. Apart from that, it’s a nice looking piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same as shown
reviews.reviewText: Item was the same as advertisedThat’s an a+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Jade bracelet seems extremely fragile.
reviews.reviewText: Ross and Simon Jade bracelet broken at one of the jade jewels from normal wearing. Gifted 5 months after receiving order from Amazon. Broke after 2 weeks after giving gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the look!
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this was put together. The design is great and the lighter Jade green is a great accessory to may outfit colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My bracelet broke loved it so, I'm devastated 😭/// I am so pleased I received my bracelet I am very very happy with it.
